I think the Catholic Church needs to change in a few ways. Their views are not very accepting of many things. For example, the Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. They have strong views on these issues, but they are a bit old-fashioned. If the Church were to change its views and be more modern, it might not lose its followers.

Many people are starting to disagree with the Church on certain subjects. They see the Church's views as wrong. The Church is against abortion, but if you are for it, you might not want to be part of a Church that teaches it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it, you might not want to be part of a Church that does not agree.

I do not see why priests cannot be married or have female priests. But I do not know if this would have prevented some of the problems the Church has faced. If priests were allowed to be married, would they have acted differently? It is hard to say.

I do not see why priests cannot have a family life. Everyone else in the world works and has a family. Priests can devote their life to God, but they can also have a family. I do not see why this is not possible.

I'm not against gay marriage. I think people should not be punished for their sexual orientation. It is not a choice. People are born that way.

Gay people should not be blamed for how they are. It's not something they can change. I don't think it's fair to say a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I haven't thought a lot about this issue, but I think it's wrong to say that. People are not born with a choice about their sexual orientation. It's just how they are.

I don't think the federal government should be involved in this issue. It's not a matter of law or morality. I don't think they should tell people who they can or cannot marry.

I don't think gay people should be blamed or punished for being who they are. They should not be treated unfairly. The federal government should not interfere in people's personal lives.

It's a person's choice who they love and who they marry. The government should not stop them.

I think the federal government is not in its place in this issue. It's not about the country's security or morals. It's just about people's personal lives.

People should be free to choose who they love and marry. They should not be punished for being gay.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. 

Because 
There is no good reason not to. 

Many people think gay couples are a threat to the family. But this is not true. 

Gay couples are different from straight couples. And they have different needs. 

It's like two sides of the same coin. Heads and tails are not the same. But they are connected. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the right to get married. 

If a gay couple gets sick, their partner can't visit them in the hospital. They are not considered family. 

This is unfair. If you spend your life with someone, they should be able to visit you when you are sick. 

Many studies have shown that gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same reasons for a happy relationship. 

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They want a marriage certificate from the government. 

If the government gives a civil union, why not a marriage? 

This is like segregation - separate but unequal. 

People worry about adoption and how a gay couple will affect the community. But people are the same no matter if they are gay or straight. 

They have the same roles in a relationship. They love each other and want to be together. 

But people are afraid of change. They don't know what to expect. 

In New York City, they have special schools for kids of gay parents. Because they get bullied in public schools. 

Gay couples can be good parents. They can be community involved like straight couples. 

It's about personality, not gay or straight. 

I think the government should be involved in making gay marriage legal. The federal government should make it legal in every state. 

I think the amendment to ban gay marriage is wrong. It's based on personal morality, but morality is different for everyone. 

The government should not make laws based on one group's morality. It's unfair to ignore other people's views. 

The government should be fair to everyone. It should not make laws that enforce one group's standards on the whole country. 

Many people are against gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. 

We should listen to experts, not just what our friends and neighbors say. 

If we listened to experts, we would see the world differently.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I see many drugs that are against the law, but they are still useful. For example, oxycotton and Vicodin are two of them. We use them because they are helpful. Some people think that just because a drug is against the law, it is not useful. But that is not true.

I think marijuana should be available for medical use. If a drug is against the law, it does not mean it is not helpful. We should use it if it helps people. 

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you use too much of either one, it can cause problems. But some people think that if we make marijuana legal, people will use it more. I do not think that is true. If we remove the idea that marijuana is bad, people might use it responsibly.

People have a bad idea about marijuana because it is against the law. But it is not as bad as other drugs like heroin or cocaine. If we change the way we think about marijuana, people might use it for medical reasons. 

I do not think we should make marijuana legal all at once. We should do it slowly and carefully. This way, people will not use it too much.

I think the church has changed to fit the 21st century. It's not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I had to wear nice dresses and matching shoes and a purse. It was a big deal.

As I grew older, the church made some changes. They now have a shorter mass for teenagers. It's just 30 minutes long. People dress more casually now, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes or jeans and khakis.

I think this change is positive. It makes the church more welcoming to people. I don't know much about the church's politics, but that's my opinion.

Some people accuse the Catholic Church of covering up pedophilia cases. I don't think changing the church's rules would have stopped these problems. There are men who are married and still become pedophiles. It's not because of the church's rules that they become pedophiles.

I think when men become priests, they choose to do so. They know the rules of the church. If they want to get married, they could choose a different faith. Some churches allow priests to be married.

I think pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born this way. It's not because of how they are raised. The church can't change that. If they knew about the problems and covered them up, that's wrong. But I think in many cases, they didn't know.

I don't have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea of going to war. But I think many Americans were still very upset about the September 11 attacks. I think the Bush administration went to war because of a false story. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This was not true.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said Saddam Hussein was connected to Osama Bin Laden and the September 11 attacks. But this was not true.

I am very upset about this. I think the Bush administration has broken the law. They should own up to their mistake. Even Colin Powell, who presented a report to the UN, now says he was not sure about the evidence.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They want to control the country. I think they wanted to go to war from the beginning.

One official, the Secretary of the Treasury, wrote a book saying the younger Bush wanted to go to war because he was angry with Saddam Hussein. He also wanted to control Iraq's oil.

I think the war has gone on too long. But if we leave now, more people may die. The country may fall into civil war.

The UN and the US are working together to find a new way. They want a group of countries from the area to help Iraq. But I am not sure this is a good idea. Iraq's government is very weak. The country may not be able to govern itself.

The current government in Iraq is not working well. The Prime Minister does not have much power. A man named Mugtada al-Sadr has a lot of influence. His party has many seats in the Parliament. I think the government is having trouble because of these problems.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. At first, I think it's pointless. It's not a war that was officially declared by the US Congress. I think it's more about getting back at Iraq because they are blamed for the September 11 attacks.

I don't really know the details, but I know that we're staying in Iraq to help them build a democracy and also to get oil from them. But this is not a good reason to stay. It makes many people unhappy.

If we stay, we have to build democracy, which takes a long time. If we leave, Iraqis will be upset because we made things bad for them. They will have to start over.

I don't know what to say about this topic. It's hard for me to talk about. 

I think the war should continue, but not be called a war. I think we use guns to show that we are strong and powerful. But we didn't officially declare war on Iraq, which is not right.

I think it's a good idea to help Iraq, but we should not waste our resources. I feel bad for President Bush because the war is making him look bad.

The Vietnam War was also not officially declared, and it's now called a meaningless war. I don't want the same thing to happen with Iraq.

It's hard for me to say that I want the war to end. Many families I know have sons and daughters in Iraq, and I don't want them to be in danger. But it's hard to stay in Iraq because we have a different culture and we might try to change them into a second United States, which would be bad for them.

I think the whole situation will last for many years. That's my opinion.

I do not agree that it is right to make marijuana legal. I think it is up to the churches and the Constitution. The Constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not decide what is right or wrong for a church. It should let the churches decide.

The Constitution is very clear on this. It says that the government must not interfere with the churches. If the government tries to enforce laws about marijuana, it would be against the Constitution. This would be wrong.

Some people who want to make marijuana illegal are choosing the rules of one church over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support marijuana. But this does not mean that the government should decide what the churches can and cannot make illegal.

Separation of church and state is a key part of the Constitution. This allows for religious freedom in the United States. Even if someone wanted to make an amendment to the Constitution, it would be wrong. An amendment would change what is already written. It would also be against the idea of freedom.

I do not think any government should control this issue. The government should not push for an amendment to ban marijuana. This would show that the government prefers one religion over others.

The government should let the churches decide about marijuana. There is no good reason for the government to get involved. It would be based on personal views, not facts. I do not see how making marijuana illegal would help the economy. It might even help it.

In conclusion, I disagree with making marijuana legal. I think it is up to the churches and the Constitution. The government should not interfere with what the churches decide.

The war in Iraq was a very difficult decision. I do not think the government was honest with the American people about the reasons for the war. Before invading Iraq, the government tried to link the invasion to the terrorist attacks of September 11th. However, the two events were not closely related.

I am against war, especially a preemptive strike. I think the war in Iraq is like the Vietnam War. The government did not learn from its past mistakes.

Many American soldiers have died in the war. The government did not prepare for the aftermath of removing the Iraqi government. They did not plan for the power vacuum and chaos that would follow.

The US government tried to impose a democratic government on Iraq. This was similar to what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to push out Communists and create a democratic government.

The US government should have known that the war would be long and hard. It would not be a clear victory like in many other wars. In Vietnam, the US was fighting an army, not the people. It is hard to defeat people who are fighting for their country.

I think the government was not prepared for the war. They did not plan for all possible outcomes. They did not think about what would happen after they removed the Iraqi government.

We are still in Iraq today, and many American soldiers are still dying. We are trying to train the Iraqi army and police to be able to police their own country. This is a long process.

I think the government tried to deceive the American people by making them think the war would be short and successful. But it takes years to implement a new form of government and make it successful.

In our own country, democracy was a long struggle. There was civil war and tension before we had a powerful government. The US government made the war in Iraq seem like an easy thing to do. But it is not easy.

It is hard to decide whether to stay in Iraq or leave. We took away their government and way of life. It is hard to abandon them now. But there are many American casualties, and it is hard to know how many is too many.

One of the reasons for invading Iraq was the claim that they had weapons of mass destruction. But no such weapons were ever found. We are getting oil from Iraq, and it is often about money and controlling resources.

Let's hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. But it will probably take time.

I am in favor of gay marriage. I have been for it for a long time. I think it's a personal choice. Many scientists now say it's not just a matter of how people are raised, but also because of their biology. This means people should not be treated unfairly because of something they cannot control.

I think it's not right for the government to tell people what to do in their personal lives. The issue of gay marriage is not just a state or national problem, but a personal issue. In my neighborhood, I see gay couples living normal lives. They walk their dogs and do the same things as other families.

I don't think President Bush has the right to decide what marriage means. I think his views are old-fashioned. Scientists have found that some people are born gay because of a chemical difference in their brains. This has nothing to do with how they were raised.

One of the reasons people are against gay marriage is that it seems unnatural. But it's not just about that. If a man and woman want to get married, they can do it in secret. But if two men or two women want to get married, it's a big public issue.

I think marriage should be a personal matter, not something the government should decide. It's not the government's business what people do in their private lives.

No, I don't have any other thoughts on this issue.

You put something on the internet, it is public. People can see it. You cannot control who sees it. When you post something, it can affect how people think of you.

As a resident advisor, I have had to deal with this before. You put something on the internet, and it can hurt you. If you talk about violence or shootings, people will see it. They will think you are serious.

The internet is public. Everyone can see it. If your friends have you on Myspace or Facebook, they will see the bulletin. The school has to act on it. They cannot ignore it.

But, you do not know what is real and what is not. Some people play jokes. They may say something to see how people react. It could be like an experiment gone wrong.

In our school, something happened. Someone overheard something, and they called the school. We found out who said it, and it was not a joke. He had things on his Facebook that were serious. When you put things on the internet, you have no control. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it there.

If someone looks at your Facebook or Myspace, it is not an invasion of privacy. You gave them access to it. If there is danger, the school has to take it seriously.

But, school officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at your private messages or phone calls. If it is brought to their attention, it is different.

Do not friend your residents on the internet. You do not want to know what they are doing. It is not your place. You do not want to have to deal with it.

I think the war has gone on for too long. 
Its purpose was good at the beginning. 
It was to restore democracy in another country. 
But now, I think we have lost sight of that purpose. 
We are fighting for reasons that are not clear. 
Maybe we fight just to show we are strong. 

I think the original reason was not fair. 
The war was started by the U.S. president George Bush's father. 
He had a problem with Saddam Hussein. 
If the goal was to give democracy to a country without a fair government, that would be a good reason. 
But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair. 

I think we got our message across at the start of the war. 
But it has been going on for too long. 
Many years have passed, and we are still fighting. 
That is not fair to the people of the country we are fighting for. 

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a bad leader, that would be a good reason for war. 
But I do not think that is why we are fighting now. 
I think our reason for fighting has changed. 
We are fighting just because we are fighting. 

I think the war should end. 
The country's government will have to take care of itself soon. 
We have many problems in our own country that need money. 
We have poverty and need to fix our roads and schools. 
We should spend our money on these things, not on a long war. 

Many billions of dollars are being spent on the war. 
We do not need to spend so much money on war. 
We can use that money to help our own people. 
It is not right to spend our money on a war that we are not winning. 

I think that is all I want to say.

I have a question. Can I ask for more information about something?

Someone was able to prevent a bad thing from happening because they looked at some information on the internet. They saw it on a website called Myspace. If you put information on the internet, many people can see it. On Myspace, you have to ask someone to be your "friend" to see their information. But when you accept someone as a friend, you are giving them permission to see your information.

I think it is good that someone was able to see that information and stop a bad thing from happening.

But it is also a problem. We can't have one person watching all of the students' information all the time. That would be unfair. It would be like picking out some students to watch and not others.

I don't think it is a good idea to have someone's job be to look at people's information on the internet. But it depends on why they were looking at it.

I have a Facebook account, and it bothers me that there are people who can see my information. I saw a TV show about a man who was looking at people's information on the internet. He was able to find a girl's screen name and talk to her on the computer. It was scary.

Some of my friends and I have talked about this problem. We know that people can see a lot of our information on the internet. We can limit what we put up, but it's hard. We want to be able to communicate with our friends, but we don't want to share too much information.

I heard that a school my roommate went to banned students from having Myspace. I don't know if that is a good idea. I don't think the school had the right to tell students what they can and cannot do on the internet.

I want to talk about the Iraq War. I feel bad saying this, but it's not really important anymore. The whole country thinks it was a bad idea. The government in the United States did not agree, but most people did.

New polls show that seventy-five percent of the people in the world think the war was a bad idea. Eighty percent of Iraqi people think the same. Most of the American soldiers in Iraq also think the war was a bad idea and they want to leave within one year.

The war has been a disaster since the beginning. Iraq was already in trouble before the United States came in. Now, leaving the country is also a problem. There is no easy solution to problems in the Middle East.

The United States and the Middle East have different cultures. The American government thinks it can bring democracy to Iraq, but the people of Iraq do not want this. Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but is it worth invading another country?

Before going to war, we should think about the pros and cons. The war has caused many problems in Iraq. We should weigh these problems against the reasons for staying. I do not see a good reason to stay in Iraq. If the government wants to leave slowly, I would not have a problem with that. But I do not see a reason to stay any longer than we should.

Many Iraqis want the United States to leave. At least eighty percent of them think we should leave within one year. These are the people we are trying to help. If they tell us to leave, we should listen.

If we leave and things get worse, we can say we tried to help but they did not want our help. We can try to help again later, but we will at least be the good guys. Well, not really good guys, but better than we are now.

I think there is still a problem with gender equality in the United States. It's not just about women, though. The problem is different in different jobs. 

For example, in some areas, women have a harder time getting ahead. This is because society has been taught for a long time that men should be in charge. So, when a woman applies for a job, people may not choose her because of this idea.

The same thing happens with men. For example, in the fashion industry, men who like fashion may be looked down on. People may think they don't know what fashion is for women.

It's also true for stay-at-home dads. People may think it's strange for a man to stay home and take care of children. But this is changing. More and more men are staying home to raise their kids, and people are starting to accept this.

In fields like fashion, people are starting to listen to women's opinions. But it takes time for change to happen. We have to be careful not to push too hard, or people will resist. We've made progress, and change takes time.

It's not just about gender, either. People from different places or with different backgrounds may be discriminated against in the same way. For example, a man from a rural area who has a good education but poor grammar may be looked down on by others. They may think he's not smart because of his grammar.

So, we have to work slowly and carefully to make change. We've made progress, and people are starting to accept women in charge and stay-at-home dads. But it's not easy, and it takes time.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime to have it. It's like a traffic ticket now. You can get in trouble, but it's not as bad as before.

If you get in trouble for marijuana, it can affect your life in some ways. It can affect your job and other things. This is a big problem for some people.

But some people say it's better to not make it a crime. It costs a lot to arrest and jail people. It costs money to bring them to court and to pay lawyers and judges.

Some cities don't want to make this change. They don't want marijuana in their city. But some cities, like Denver, are different. They are more open to new ideas.

In Denver, they have more money now to spend on things like education and food for people who need it. This is good.

Marijuana is not something we want everywhere. But it's also not something we want to ignore. There are good reasons to think about this issue carefully.

If marijuana is legal, people might smoke it and drive. That's a big problem. And some people would smoke it in public, and that would be awkward.

Alcohol is bad for you too. It can affect your driving and your decisions. Marijuana can affect your lifestyle and your decisions too.

No two people react the same to substances. Some people can handle things well, and some people cannot. It's hard to know what to do.

Both marijuana and alcohol have bad effects. I think they should be treated carefully.

I would say yes to changing the Catholic Church. 
Because many of the things they do are old and do not change. 
They do things the same way for a long time. 
It is good to have traditions, but it is also important to change. 

A lot of Catholics go to church every week. 
They are strict about how things are done. 
Sometimes I feel that the Catholic Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules exactly. 
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 
They also do not accept people of other religions. 

For example, my parents were married in a different church because my mom was Catholic and my dad was not. 
The Catholic Church would not marry them because of my dad's religion. 
This is not being tolerant of other religions. 
We are taught to love others, but the Catholic Church does not act this way. 

I think some Catholic teachings are good, but the way the Church acts is not always right. 
The Church continues to do things the old way, even if it is not good. 

I do not think that allowing priests to marry would stop them from being bad to children. 
People who harm children will do it no matter what. 
It is not the same as being married to a spouse. 

So, I do not think that allowing priests to be married would help.

I am not sure about this issue. I do not have a strong opinion yet. It is a difficult topic. The separation of church and state and the definition of marriage make it hard to decide without hurting anyone's feelings. I do not know. I think that civil unions could be a good idea. Marriage is a sacrament for some people. If you are married, you should be equal in the eyes of the law. A civil union is just two people who are together.

I think it is better to have a civil union instead of marriage. This way, the government does not have to get involved with the kind of marriage it is. The government should not care if people are baptized or not.

I do not think that gay marriage should be a problem. It is two people who love each other and want to be together. They should have the same rights as everyone else.

If all the states can agree on something, it should be made into a federal law. A constitutional amendment to ban gay marriage is not necessary. It is a small issue and not big enough to change the constitution.

I do not think it is important to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. It is not a big enough issue.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Therefore, they should be allowed to marry based on each state's decision.

I do not agree with the school officials checking Myspace.  Myspace is a public website.  If you post something on it, others can see it.  This includes school officials.

If you post something on Myspace, you should not expect to keep it private.  It is easy to find things on the internet.  If you write something bad about someone, do not put it in an email.  Emails can come back to haunt you.

Once something is on the internet, it is always there.  If you do something bad, you will get in trouble.  School officials should not go on the internet just to catch students.  But if they find something that makes the school safer, that is okay.

Schools have to keep students safe.  They have to be prepared for things like school shootings.  Schools have drills to prepare for emergencies.  School officials checked Myspace to keep the school safe.  They were not doing it just to catch students.

We had safety drills in my high school.  We practiced what to do in case of emergencies.  This was to keep the school safe.  School officials checked Myspace for the same reason.

They wanted to prevent a tragedy like Columbine.  I think that is a good reason to check Myspace.  That is all I have to say.

I was for the war at first. I was affected by 9/11. I wanted to help. But now I am against the war. We went to war without a plan. We did not think about the long-term effects. We did not prepare well.

I think we made a big mistake. The people in that country are fighting with each other. They cannot be friends with us if they cannot be friends with themselves. I do not care about what happens there. They are fighting with each other and cannot take care of themselves.

War is different for them than it is for us. They are savage when they fight. They do not want to make their country better. They just want us to leave.

I think we were looking for revenge. President Bush wanted to go to war because people were angry. He declared war on Iraq without a plan. We did not have a choice, but we could have done it better. We should have had a clear plan to create order.

We did not work together. We did not know what we were doing. I think emotion and anger led us to war. That's what we created in that country. We are not the ones to change those people. They will always be like that.

We are not making enough progress. We made some progress, but it's not enough to stay. The country will collapse when we leave. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should just leave.
